bike.description: 6061 triple gauge aluminum main tubes and stays, sloping design, rear carrier and fender mounts, forged dropouts with double eyelets
bike.paint_description: M: Dakota Grey   F: Dakota Grey

components.description: Jamis City/Cross radiused aluminum blades, forged dropouts with single eyelet
Alex ID-19 double wall alloy rims with GSW sidewall, 36H, NuVinci N360 continuously variable planetary (CVP) transmission rear hub, Formula alloy front hub with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Adventure with Solid Shielding puncture protection and reflective sidewall, 700 x 32c
Forged alloy crank, single 42T chainring, 170mm (14-18"), 175mm (19-23"), with full length chainguard
City style, full alloy, with TPE non-slip insert
Tektro linear pull brakes with Tektro CL530 ergonomic designed alloy brake levers with kraton insert
Jamis ARC, 6061 aluminum, 25.4 x 27JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 580mm
Jamis adjustable threadless system (ATS) forged aluminum stem, 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (14/15/16/17/18"), 105mm (19/21"), 115mm (23"). ATS shim length 100mm
Anatomic double density kraton grip with reflective end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 350mm with alloy clamp and QR seatpin
Jamis Metro Sport with memory foam, synthetic leather cover, burnished sides and bumper springs with satin steel rails, gender specific
Full coverage fenders with adjustable stays and new designed mud flaps, Jamis carrier (capacity 18kg/40lbs.) with Jamis logo strap, rear reflector and micro bell
